mtpyglet - multitouch abstraction for pyglet¶

Soup on pyglet to provide multitouch interface.

pymt.mtpyglet.pymt_usage()¶

PyMT Usage: %s [OPTION...] -h, –help prints this mesage -f, –fullscreen force run in fullscreen -w, –windowed force run in window -p, –port=x specify TUIO port (default 3333) -H, –host=xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx specify TUIO host (default 127.0.0.1) -F, –fps show fps in window

System Message: ERROR/3 (<autodoc>, line 0)

Unexpected indentation.
–dump-frame dump each frame in file
–dump-prefix specify a prefix for each frame file
–dump-format specify a format for dump
